text: The United States National Cyclocross Championships is a four-day competition held annually each winter and is sponsored by USA Cycling. The winners at various levels, including elite, U-23, masters, juniors, and collegiate for men and women, wear the coveted stars and stripes jersey and are crowned United States national cyclo-cross champions. The National Champion competes in the Stars and Stripes Jersey in the next race season. ==Past winners== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" style="width: 80%; text-align:left;" |-
